actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the allowance of deductions for personal exemptions.

summary.text: Increases the amount of deductions for personal exemptions for a taxpayer, his dependents, persons over age 65, and blind persons to $1,000 for each exemption to which such taxpayers are entitled under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the allowance of deductions for personal exemptions.
